text:
This function __encode(MODE, value, outputVar) would have the following modes:

MODE:
- ENCODE_BASE64 => Encodes in base64
- DECODE_BASE64 => Decodes base64 value
- ENCODE_HEX => Encodes in HEX
- DECODE_HEX => Decodes HEX value
